## Words in abstracts

```{r word_counts}
library(nihexporter)
library(tidytext)

abstract_tokens %>% count(application.id, word)
```

## Sentiment analysis

```{r sentiments}
abstract_sentiments <- abstract_tokens %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments("bing"), by = "word")
```
